name: Studio MDHR
info:
• 生日: 2013 年 10 月 25 日
  • 官方网站: http://studiomdhr.com/
detail: Studio MDHR is an independent video game company founded by brothers Chad & Jared Moldenhauer. Working remotely with a team from across North America, Studio MDHR launched Cuphead on Xbox One and PC to commercial and critical acclaim.
